devdoc.details: Contract is responsible for mAsset and bAsset exchange process and managing basket with bAsset tokens. Allows to add and/or remove bAsset, calculate balances, converts tokens quantity to adjust precisions or set/get parameters: bridge, factor, range and paused.

params._paused: Flag to determine if basset should be paused.

checkBasketBalanceForDeposit(address,uin.details: Checks if ratio of bAssets in basket is within limits to make a deposit of specific asset.
checkBasketBalanceForDeposit(address,uin.return: Flag indicating whether a deposit can be made.

checkBasketBalanceForWithdrawal(address,.details: Checks if ratio of bAssets in basket is within limits to make a withdrawal of specific asset.
checkBasketBalanceForWithdrawal(address,.return: Flag indicating whether a withdrawal can be made.

convertBassetToMassetQuantity(address,ui.details: Converts bAsset to mAsset quantity. This is used to adjust precision.     Despite bAssets and mAssets having 1:1 ratio, they may have diffrent decimal factors.     Since the ratio may cause fractions, the bAsset is adjusted to match nearest non fraction amount and returned.
convertBassetToMassetQuantity(address,ui.return: Calculated amount of mAssets and Adjusted amount of bAssets.

convertMassetToBassetQuantity(address,ui.details: Converts mAsset to bAsset quantity. This is used to adjust precisions.     Despite bAssets and mAssets having 1:1 ratio, they may have diffrent decimal factors.     Since the ratio may cause fractions, the mAsset is adjusted to match nearest non fraction amount and returned.
convertMassetToBassetQuantity(address,ui.return: Calculated amount of bAssets and Adjusted amount of mAssets.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

isPowerOfTen(int256).details: Returns true if the number is power of ten.
isPowerOfTen(int256).return: Is the number power of ten.

isValidBasset(address).details: Checks if bAasset is valid by checking its presence in the bAssets factors list.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BasketManagerV3

addBassets(address[],int256[],address[],.notice: All parameters must be arrays with proper order and equal length.
